DescriptionFormatTextId.SourceString: Text_Creates a fire floor at the impact location. While standing on the fire floor, you continuously receive <Exec.MagicalDamageBase>[0] #</> distributed over <Duration>[0] second</> intervals.
DescriptionFormatTextId.LocalizedString: It can light the darkness and be thrown as an explosive. Upon explosion, deal <Exec.MagicalDamageBase>[0] _</> per second to all targets within the flame area of effect. The flame area lasts for 10 seconds.
